name: The Tree of Life (Ernesto Torres)
description:
The Tree of Life is under attack!

Protect it until it grows big enough.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Move Mouse - Pan/Adjust Camera rotation

CREDITS:

A Game by: Ernesto Torres

Assets by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

Soundtrack:

Ludum Dare 30 - Track 9 by Abstraction (http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com)

Made for Kenney Jam 2022
